amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: University of Nebraska; government; Board of Regents; election; vacancies.
amendatorysection.para: The general government of the University of Nebraska shall be vested in a board of eight regents elected from districts as provided in section 32-510. Vacancies occurring in the board shall be filled as provided in section 32-573.

crossreference.para: Election provisions, see the Election Act, section 32-101.
Official bonds and oaths, see Chapter 11.

annotation.para: Board of Regents can exercise only such powers as are expressly given to it, or which may be necessary to carry into effect those powers specially given. Regents of the University of Nebraska v. McConnell, 5 Neb. 423 (1877).
